verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: will] face a tough time at the G7 summit in Quebec , Canada since almost every leader attending the talks is angry with US tariffs . Germany 's Angela Merkel , Canada 's Justin Trudeau , and France 's Emmanuel Macron have been especially critical of Trump 's trade policy .

Germany 's Angela Merkel , Canada 's Justin Trudeau , and France 's Emmanuel Macron have been especially critical of Trump 's trade policy .

President Donald Trump will face a tough time at the G7 summit in Quebec , Canada since [ARG0: almost every leader] [V: attending] [ARG1: the talks] is angry with US tariffs . Germany 's Angela Merkel , Canada 's Justin Trudeau , and France 's Emmanuel Macron have been especially critical of Trump 's trade policy .
